scripts.build: (cd packages/recast-navigation-wasm && yarn build) && yarn workspaces foreach -t --exclude @recast-navigation/wasm run build
scripts.build:packages: (cd packages/recast-navigation-wasm && yarn build) && yarn workspaces foreach -t --include recast-navigation --include @recast-navigation/core --include @recast-navigation/three run build
scripts.test:bundlers-smoke-test: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "(cd ./examples/parcel-example && yarn build)" "(cd ./examples/react-scripts-example && yarn build)" "(cd ./examples/vite-example && yarn build)"
scripts.version: yarn changeset version && yarn install --mode update-lockfile
